body.name: Single Serve Coffee Maker for K Cup & Ground Coffee, Single Cup Coffee Maker 6 to 14 oz, Fits Travel Mug 6.7", CM-206, Red
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 37 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 37 mins
features: One-Button Operation & Fast Brewing 2 Mins: This k cup coffee maker brews your coffee fast just by pushing a single button, fresh and delicious coffee will be made in 2 minutes. Auto off feature turns off your single serve coffee maker k cup 2 mins after your last brew

One Cup Water Tank: The water reservoir has a capacity of 6-14 oz, allowing you to brew different cup sizes: 6, 8, 10, 12, 14 oz. The brew size and strength of coffee is determined by the amount of fresh water placed in the coffee maker with k cup combo

Portable & Compact Design: Size- 4.9" L x 6.7" W x 11.8" H, Weight-1.9 lb. The one cup coffee maker saves counter space, friendly to room, office, travel, hotel, apartment. Especially, the detachable drip tray enables you to adjust the suitable height to prevent coffee spills. Fits 6.7" tall travel mug
2 in 1 Brewer Style: K pod coffee maker come with reusable coffee filter and pod holder BPA free to help you brew ground coffee and K cup pods (suit any normal brands of k cup)
Easy Cleaning & Descaling: Wipe down the single cup coffee maker with a damp cloth after you’re through with your brew. Descaling every 1-2 months ensures you brew the best-tasting coffee

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2 Ways for Brewing Coffee Our single serve coffee maker k cup comes with the reusable filter & capsule basket. You can choose to add the coffee ground or K cup capsule. Self Cleaning & Auto Off Add water and press the button, the k cup coffee maker will clean itself. When the water is not enough, it will automatically shut off. Needle for K cup Capsule With the design of needle, you can just place the capsule into the basket, easy and convenient. Removable Drip Tray The drip tray can be removed to accommodate cup or mug up to 6.7"/17 cm.

The specifications about Teglu single serve coffee maker k cup CM206? Power: 800W; Voltage: 110-120V / 60Hz; Capacity: 14 Ounce; Product Net Weight: 1.9 lb; Product Size: 6.9"D x 4.9"W x 11.8"H, Fit the travel mug 6.7"/17cm. Does Teglu coffee maker with k cup combo CM206 come with a reuseable filter? Should I prepare the paper filter? Our one cup coffee maker includes:1 x Teglu single serve coffee maker; 1 x Reusable filter; 1 x Reusable capsule basket; 1 x Plastic coffee spoon; 1 x Instruction Manual (Mug and capsules are NOT included). No paper filtre required. How to descale Teglu single cup coffee maker CM206? and how often? Step 1. Fill the water tank with a mixture of vinegar and water and press the power button. Step 2. Pour 14oz water into the water tank, and then press the power button to start the rinsing process. What size of K cup capsule does Teglu one cup coffee maker CM206 fit? Our capsule basket fit all kinds of K pod(L:1.96"(5cm)/H:1.77"(4.5cm)). Is Teglu 1 cup coffee maker BPA free? Yes, the material of plastic is BPA free and food-grade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great. I've had it awhile and really like the brewer. I purchased filters and put them in a used k cup, put my own coffee in filter, wah la, good coffee fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Better than my more expensive coffee makers that I thought were stress free. They plugged up all the time and overflowed into a mess. This single server machine is quick and so easy to use. Coffee is hot. Highly recommend. Takes up very little space, beeps at the finish, and turns off when done. The water reservoir is small so it takes good aim to fill but worth the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. My only objections are the metal thing under the coffee cup partpeeled. My big issue is way too small of a water fill hole

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As advertised would recommend
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the times you only want a single cup of coffee. I have a regular pot as well . This is my back up coffeemaker and for a quick single cup of coffee or tea. Love works great. Really like the size. Doesn’t take up much counter space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good machine!
reviews.reviewText: I owned a single serve coffee maker bought from Amazon a number of years ago. It was just fine, but stopped working. It is not on Amazon offerings any more. This Teglu looked very similar. NOT!When the coffee is dispensed, drops of coffee jump out of the cup/mug onto the counter. The part which makes hole in bottom of K cup is way off to the side, and sometimes does not function correctly, causing hot steam and coffee grounds to blow up and spew, as described by another reviewer. The grate which the cup or mug sits on does not have any reservoir space under it to catch any overflow! Why a grate that has plastic flat against it? I am returning, and ordering a different coffee machine today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok, not as good as it could be.
reviews.reviewText: So I drink way to much coffee, I go thru about 2 of these a year, this one has fast brew but the flavor of the coffee is not as good as the last one I purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is very easy and makes the coffee super fast and hot. I recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and cost
reviews.reviewText: My Keurig broke down and I bought this one to save money. I was apprehensive about whether it would do well, but it makes great coffee. I love it!
